sourcesContent:
Registration

Authorization

{{token}}

{{userName}}

{{login}}

{{password}}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CookingService } from '../cooking.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-authorization', templateUrl: './authorization.component.html', styleUrls: ['./authorization.component.css'] }) export class AuthorizationComponent implements OnInit { public token: string = "token"; public isRegirtrated : boolean = false; userName: string = 'u'; login: string = 'l'; password: string = 'p'; constructor (private cookingService: CookingService) {} changeState(){ this.isRegirtrated = !this.isRegirtrated; } signIn(): void { this.cookingService.userSignIn(this.login, this.password).subscribe(tok => this.token = tok); } signUp(): void { this.cookingService.userSignUp(this.userName, this.login, this.password).subscribe( { next:(data:any) => {this.token = data} } ); } ngOnInit() : void { } }
